name: UpdateSolutionFolder
description:
Update a solution folder in Freshservice by ID.

Use this tool to update a specific solution folder in Freshservice by providing the folder ID.

parameters.name: solution_folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the solution folder to update in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: ID of the solution folder that has to be updated

parameters.name: solution_folder_data
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the solution folder update, including id, category_id, name, description, and more.

id.description: Unique identifier of the solution folder

category_id.description: Unique identifier of the solution category

position.description: The position of the solution folder in the folder listing. When there are more than 1 folders in a category, then this will determine the position.

managed_by_group.description: Agent group ID who can edit the articles in the folder

managed_by_agent.description: The agent ID who can edit the articles in the folder

requester_groups.description: Requester group IDs that have access to view this folder

agent_groups.description: Agent group IDs that have access to view this folder

departments.description: The department IDs whose members will be able to view the folder

all_agents.description: Is True if all agents can view this folder

everyone.description: Is True if all users can view this folder

logged_in_users.description: Is True if all logged in users can view this folder

visibility.description: Users who can view this folder

default_folder.description: If this is a default folder shipped with the product. You can create or rename a default folder.

value_schema.description: Folder that needs to be created

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the solution folder that has to be updated

value_schema.description: ID of the solution folder that has to be updated
